RumorFact.Text: The Nomai planned to conduct a survey expedition to Dark Bramble's north pole in search of survivors.

ExploreFact.Text: The Nomai were unable to locate any survivors on Dark Bramble's exterior. They decided against further expeditions into the bramble due to their limited methods of travel.
The Nomai reported seeing countless hordes of anglerfish inside the bramble.
A Nomai named Plume proposed locating an anglerfish nest inside Dark Bramble to cull the anglerfish's population, but was strongly dissuaded from this plan as it would endanger the native species.

RumorFact.Text: The Nomai discovered something during their final expedition of Dark Bramble's exterior. They constructed platforms on the side of the northern glacier to guide each other to this discovery.

ExploreFact.Text: The Nomai found several species frozen inside this glacier on the underside of Dark Bramble's north pole.
The Nomai hypothesized that these species must have originated within the frozen planet, and were launched within shards of ice to the planets that would become their new habitats.

RumorFact.Text: A Nomai named Plume speculated about the existence of an anglerfish nest inside Dark Bramble.
A Nomai named Keek discovered this anglerfish nest while trying to reach the Vessel.

ExploreFact.Text: A cluster of anglerfish eggs guarded fiercely by anglerfish deep within Dark Bramble.
A Nomai named Keek discovered this nest on a desperate mission to reach the Vessel before they were cornered by anglerfish. They met a gruesome end.
Keek noted that the anglerfish eggs were warm, gelatinous, and filled with liquid.
